data.text: @VanityFair The reporter/contributing editor, gave the truth in the transcripts, a very different meaning - a lie. That's unprofessionalism to the max.
@VanityFair Out of curiosity, I wrote out the transcripts, then I read the editted print version  They sound like very different stories.
@VanityFair This is definitely questionable reporting, editting & professionalism. The reporter gave her own spin, not the truth. VF has become a rag.
@VanityFair That Angie wasn't even in the room. If u write out the transcripts compare them 2 the editted version in print - they sound very different.
@VanityFair The black & white as seen in ur transcripts is the reporter made it sound, as tho it was a real scenario not a game. She neglected 2 state..
@VanityFair W the knowledge​ that the reporter is a contributing editor, it's all 2 obvious why she didn't  attempt a diplomatic resolve. Unprofessional
@VanityFair Hey VF - it wouldn't surprise me if you're fishing 4 an interview with Brad. That reporter never should've mentioned his movies. Agenda?Yup
@VanityFair Got her right together. https://t.co/riGGtvQtKQ
@Lime4ya @VanityFair I respect her charity work & used to love her. Then the whole Brad-dad attack happened & it altered my view of her forever. Very weird
@CoolGreenPines @VanityFair I actually like Jolie, and she does so much for charity. So this shocked me, she is laughing talking about it? Really?SMH
@Lime4ya @VanityFair I totally agree. But I think we're all discovering it more & more. I love how she inserts she wasn't there too. Uh ok. Guilt much.
@VanityFair  https://t.co/cXRpYBTrkX
@VanityFair @deray The reportee did her a favor. The "context" made it sound even MORE tone deaf and entitled. Gross.
@VanityFair @deray 🔥🔥🔥
@VanityFair Just as a reality check - #BradPitt is anything but laid back. He shouldn't have been spoken of so much in Angie's interview. It's all wrong
@VanityFair Vanity Fair, I ustu support u. Not anymore You've become so much like a tabloid & this latest sensationalism is all wrong. #EnoughIsEnough
@VanityFair In the editted version it shud have been added Angie wasn't even there 4 the audition. It should have been clear the kids new it was a game
@VanityFair In the editted version, u should have added that Loung Ung was an orphan hence a reason orphanages were looked in2. U owe Angie an apology
@VanityFair Angie was very successful when they got 2gether. U could feel her bias towards Brad. I hope & pray that Angie never works with you again.
@VanityFair I think your reporter was biased. Why would she describe Brad as ' laid back golden boy', mention his movies & Angie was very successful  .
@VanityFair Your transcripts show that the reporter knew Angie wasn't present. It further shows it was a make believe game for an audition.
@VanityFair "After reviewing the audiotape, V.F. stands by Peretz’s story as published" drag her!
@VanityFair Angelina was not even there for the audition & explained badly what her crews told her.

@VanityFair Angelina: don't fuck wit me! I wanna see the receipts!!!
Vanity Fair: https://t.co/cgKU9wQ5WF
@VanityFair Wow, how out of touch you have to be to ok this, and talk about it!!
